name: Fire Bolt
description: You hurl a mote of fire at a creature or an object within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes 1d10 Fire damage. A flammable object hit by this spell starts burning if it isn’t being worn or carried.
upgrade: The damage increases by 1d10 when you reach levels 5 (2d10), 11 (3d10), and 17 (4d10).

name: Mage Armor
description: You touch a willing creature who isn’t wearing armor, and a protective magical force surrounds it until the spell ends. The target’s base AC becomes 13 + its Dexterity modifier.

name: Magic Missile
description: You create darts of magical force that hit automatically. Each dart deals 1d4 + 1 force damage to its target. You create three darts at level 1, four at level 5, and five at level 11.
upgrade: You create additional darts as you level up (5 at 11th level, 6 at 17th level).

name: Shield
description: An invisible force field surrounds you, granting a +5 bonus to AC and negating magic missile attacks.

name: Counterspell
description: You interrupt the casting of another spell within range. If the spell is 3rd level or lower, it is automatically negated. Higher-level spells require an ability check.

name: Fireball
description: A bright streak flashes through the air, followed by a violent explosion. Each creature in a 20-foot-radius sphere must make a Dexterity saving throw. A target takes 8d6 fire damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one.
upgrade: The damage increases by 1d6 for every two levels beyond 3rd.

name: Polymorph
description: You transform a creature that you can see within range into a new form. The target assumes the hit points, ability scores, and other features of the new form, which can be any beast form of CR equal to or less than the target's original CR.

name: Wall of Force
description: An invisible, impenetrable barrier of force springs into existence. It is impervious to all damage, and creatures cannot pass through it.

name: Time Stop
description: You take 1d4 + 1 turns in a row, during which other creatures are frozen in time. After the effect ends, time resumes normally.

name: Wish
description: By casting this spell, you can request nearly any effect. The spell’s effects are so powerful that they can alter reality itself, but there’s a risk of something going wrong.

name: Cure Wounds
description: A creature you touch regains hit points equal to 1d8 + your spellcasting ability modifier. At higher levels, the healing increases by 1d8 for every level above 1st.
upgrade: Healing increases by 1d8 per level above 1st.

name: Summon Monster
description: You summon a creature of the chosen type to fight for you. The creature obeys your commands and acts on its turn in initiative order.
upgrade: At higher levels, you can summon more powerful creatures.

name: Healing Word
description: A creature of your choice that you can see within range regains hit points equal to 1d4 + your spellcasting ability modifier.
upgrade: At higher levels, healing increases by 1d4 for every level above 1st.

name: Misty Step
description: You teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space that you can see.

name: Mirror Image
description: Three illusory duplicates of yourself appear in your space. They make attacks against you harder, as any attack roll has a chance of hitting a duplicate instead.

name: Hold Person
description: You target one humanoid within range. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or be paralyzed for the duration.
upgrade: At higher levels, you can target more creatures (up to 5 at level 6).

name: Detect Thoughts
description: You can read the surface thoughts of a creature within range. As an action, you can probe deeper, but the target can resist with a Wisdom saving throw.

name: Greater Invisibility
description: You become invisible. While invisible, you can still take actions and cast spells without becoming visible.

name: Cloudkill
description: A cloud of poison spreads out from a point within range. Creatures inside the cloud must make a Constitution saving throw or take 5d8 poison damage on a failed save, or half as much on a success.
upgrade: The damage increases by 1d8 for every level above 5th.

name: Finger of Death
description: You point your finger at a target. The target must make a Constitution saving throw or take 7d8 necrotic damage. If the creature is reduced to 0 hit points by this damage, it dies and you gain temporary hit points equal to half its hit point maximum.

name: Telekinesis
description: You can move an object or creature with your mind. If you target a creature, it must succeed on a Strength saving throw or be moved up to 30 feet in any direction.

name: True Seeing
description: You can see things as they actually are. For the duration, you can see through normal and magical darkness, see invisible creatures or objects, and see into the Ethereal Plane.

name: Power Word Heal
description: You speak a word of power that heals one creature you can see within range. The creature regains all its hit points and is cured of any conditions afflicting it.

name: Divination
description: You ask a question concerning a specific goal, event, or activity to occur within 7 days. The GM offers a truthful reply that is usually a short phrase.

name: Banishment
description: You attempt to banish a creature to another plane of existence. The target must succeed on a Charisma saving throw or be banished.

name: Earthquake
description: A powerful tremor shakes the ground in a 100-foot radius around you. Each creature in that area must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 50 (10d10) bludgeoning damage and is knocked prone. On a successful save, it takes half as much damage and isn't knocked prone. In addition, buildings and structures within the area may collapse or be damaged. The ground itself becomes difficult terrain for the duration of the spell.
